issue.title: www.pinterest.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.pinterest.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pinterest.com%2F) ### Comment > When I open Pinterest, initially a few pins and blank spots where ads appear are there. That's normal. But after a little bit of scrolling, everything disappears. Pins don't pop up anymore and occasionally I'll see outlines or pins trying to load as I scroll but ultimately nothing appears. This does seem to happen on the page recommending all types of pins instead of pages recommending pins for specific boards. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/eus80d1lhqg4kk0cw48ccosswkgcokks2mqyuy2ddw.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/20bq86h0f3hcck8wwg88kcoss4g44w0i3fhssmvvdw.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/dh1zrjbgy5cks0wookssosk88cw4848cbdi0d9m0bk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.0.230 MV3 System version: | Chromium OS 14541.0.0 Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:

issue.title: claude.ai
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://claude.ai/login?returnTo=%2F%3F](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fclaude.ai%2Flogin%3FreturnTo%3D%252F%253F) ### Comment > When AdGuard “Extension” is enabled, visiting Claude and every message sent to Claude AI lead to “Claude will return soon” page, but will work with a manual page refresh (cmd-r). > > AdGuard “Content Blockers” doesn’t break the experience. It works fine when the extension off & content blockers on. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
> @sssh7710 혹시 AdGuard 설정 파일을 filters@adguard.com 으로 보내주시겠어요?

보냈습니다
